knimeNode.name: Create Directory
knimeNode.shortDescription: Create a directory locally or on a server.

fullDescription.intro: This node creates a directory on the server specified by the connection information and outputs a variable that references to it. If no connection information is given the node creates the directory locally.
fullDescription.option: The location where the directory should be created.
Name of the directory that should be created. It can also be a path of folders that will be created recursively (separated by /).
Name of the variable that will contain the URI to the created directory. '?' will be replaced by the directory name.
If this is checked the node will abort if the directory already exists.

ports.inPort: Port object containing the connection information to the server. (Optional)
ports.outPort: Variable port object, containing the URI to the created directory. The name of the variable is dir_<Name>.
